sources.title: Beware of Barnacle Bill (1935)
sources.description: To the classic tune of "Barnacle Bill the Sailor", Olive explains that she can't marry Popeye because she's in love with Barnacle Bill (an unusually large Bluto), who then comes by and proceeds to pound Popeye (until he eats his spinach, of course). Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/beware-of-barnacle-bill-1935/

metadata.Plot: To the classic tune of "Barnacle Bill the Sailor", Olive explains that she can't marry Popeye because she's in love with Barnacle Bill (an unusually large Bluto), who then comes by and proceeds to pound Popeye (until he eats his spinach, of course).
metadata.Actors: William Costello, William Pennell, Mae Questel
